title: Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News       News about Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore is regularly distributed to the local media as:  New Releases (on general news such as prescribed burns, beach advisories, facility closings/openings, etc). Program Announcements (on programs, festivals, or other activities for visitors). Media Advisories (on upcoming press conferences or other press events).  This information is also available on either our News Release page or Schedule of Events page. If your news office would like to receive these announcements via e-mail, please send us an e-mail with your business/organization's name, contact person's name, phone number, and e-mail address, and we will add you to our list.
